1.content:
We know you're in high school but who are?


Billy - you're just Mr Average. You aren't exceptionally good at anything, average looking and you don't stand out at all. Struggle to fit in to any group as you aren't really good enough to be part of any club or sport. You have a few close friends but nobody really notices you. If only you could get their attention!

Amy - you try and get on with everyone. You don't have the looks to attract popularity, just an undeveloped teen. So you're always friendly and never say a bad word about anyone, always wanting to help others. You thought by being nice to everyone you'd have lots of friends and be popular but sadly people take advantage of your kindness and you never feel like you're rewarded for all the good things you do!
1.title: Who are you?

choices: You Swap Something Between Yourself and Someone Else at the School Bus Stop
You Swap Something Between Two People at the School Bus Stop
You Wait Until You Board the School Bus, Then Swap Things Between People There
You Wait Until You Arrive at the School, Then Swap Things Between People There
You Decide to Skip School and Go Downtown, Maybe the Mall, and Swap Things There
11.content:
All ready for school, you looked into the mirror and told yourself "Okay, Billy. Today is going to be different. You're going to get noticed." Okay, maybe it didn't mean anything. You always made that speech, every morning before heading to school. But what you didn't realize was that today really was going to be different, because of what was waiting for you downstairs.

A few minutes later, you were on your way out of the house to catch the bus, but before you even reached the door, your mother stopped you. "Honey, this came for you," she said, handing you a box, with your name on it. You didn't recognize the sender, but took the small box anyway.

Outside, on the way to the bus stop, you opened the box and took the contents out. It was a device of some kind, with buttons. Definitely electronic, but it looked almost alien-like in design. Was this a toy? You pressed something on the side of the small device, thinking it was an "on" button, and that's when everything got kind of weird.

You stopped suddenly and closed your eyes, feeling like you just got punched in the face. When you opened your eyes again, you saw what looked like a holographic display in front of your eyes, or just an elaborate hallucination. There were categories and lists and pictures. And it seemed that the device you were holding allowed you to scroll through it all, like it was a remote control of sorts. Frankly, you were amazed.

Looking through the menus and options (and looking like a weirdo to anyone watching, with you just standing there and looking at something that everyone else couldn't see), you realized that this device was capable of making swaps between people, both physical ones and mental ones. What you couldn't figure out, however, was that a swap would also give something extra, like a twist or side-effect to the intended swap.

Smiling, realizing what this device could do, you sprinted to the bus stop, intending on trying it out on as many people as possible. Of course, no one but you would notice anything out of the ordinary, after a swap was made, but that made it all the more fun. You could do almost anything and totally get away with it!
11.title: You're Billy

12.content:
Another long day at school ends, you always hope that someone will ask you do something after school with them but yet again all your hard work in trying to be friends with people still leaves you by yourself.

You decide to head home, you'll have some time to yourself as your parents won't have finished work yet.


As you get to your front door you see a small package.

Do you pick it up?
12.title: Amy and the strange device!

choices: Put the package aside for later, you've got other things to do!
121.content:
You see a small brown box on the porch, you pick it up and take it inside.

Surprisingly it has you name on it, you find this strange as you weren't expecting anything.

You take a better look at the outside of the package, but can't see anything else on it to suggest what it is or where it came from it.

It's not very big, you can easily hold it in the palm of your hand and it doesn't weigh very much either.

What do you do with the package?
121.title: You pick up the package and take it inside to l...

info.brief_description: You discover a device that allows you to swap physical and mental traits with others!
info.description:
You're a high school student who discovers a device that allows you to swap physical and mental traits with others, however there's a twist, or a side-effect!

You can swap any psychical or mental trait you like but you always get something extra from them. Everyone makes sacrifices in this world to be anyone so you'll have to change to fit!

E.g. You wanted to swap your IQ/knowledge with the class nerd? Well you'll also get their crippling social anxiety to go with it.

Want to be on the football team? You'll get the talent to be there but also you'll end up like a stereotypical jock, a complete jerk!

The other person ends up with the opposite of what you swapped, you can only get back to normal by swapping with the original person. You took their book smarts? Well they'll have yours. If you change your mind and swap with someone else they'll get whatever you swapped from the other person.

You want to be better but you'll never know what else you'll get in return, be careful if you end up with the wrong trait you could end up acting completely differently!

The device doesn't have any more functions, if you want a different kind of story please choose one of the many others available. You can only swap between people you come into contact with. They won't be aware of the changes they'll think they have always been that.

Please try and always add something meaningful, if you want to change up the direction of the story please try and do it creatively to avoid one liners to simply generate another option to click on. - I'll try where I can moderate and improve where I can, otherwise it will be removed.
